text_about_ojos:
Your app allows its members who agree to the agreement to order from stores through its website.
Your app offers you an easy way to deliver your orders to the stores that are displayed on the website
The purpose of this site is to provide a simple and convenient service to customers and connect them to the shops in their area that can serve outdoor meals, and interactive menus allow customers to choose their favorite orders and dishes in an easy and quick way.
We have created the site to be a comprehensive electronic complex for restaurants your application is a commercial website to deliver the orders of shops through the Internet and provide a distinctive service
Your application site does not sell or interfere in any way in the production, manufacture or preparation of any food produced in stores, and what this online marketplace offers to users is only to provide the possibility of searching and finding local stores shared on the site, which provide and deliver food to their addresses and demand through it. These stores are solely responsible for complying with the laws, regulations, regulations, standards and standards applied in the country, such as those related to the preparation, preparation, sale, marketing and safety of food.
However, it is important that users understand that your application does not independently emphasize the adoption and commitment of store products, ingredients or quality of any products, or that the shop complies with applicable laws and regulations for food preparation as this responsibility rests with the shop alone. Consumers should see information provided by stores on the website or requested by consumers directly from the stores in terms of the quality of food and the reliability of the shop, as well as its compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
It does not guarantee your application in any way the quality and quality of any food, or that the food is not in accordance with applicable laws and regulations, nor does it guarantee that the menu displayed on the site matches what is actually provided to users.
Furthermore, the shop may undertake to prepare food in accordance with special standards such as organic, macrobiotic, or specially sensitive standards such as "nut-free," "gluten-free" or "lactose-free." However, your application does not independently verify or verify these pledges
Your application will not be binding or responsible for any food or services provided by stores that are unhealthy, cause injury or are unacceptable to buyers, or that do not meet buyers' expectations in any way.
Buyers are solely responsible for verifying the authenticity of the delivery addresses and your application will not have any obligation or liability for any false addresses. All food preparation and delivery is the responsibility of the shop that accepts the order. The shop will take all possible means to meet the delivery time, however delivery time may be affected by factors beyond its control and therefore cannot be guaranteed. We will notify you in case we know of any unexpected delays.
text_member:
Any member of your app gets a "username" and "password" that is selected by the member himself. The "username" is personal and is limited to the member alone, and the same "username" is not given to two different members. The "password" is known to the user alone. The user can change the password at any time. It is also the user's sole responsibility to choose and protect the password. Your application is not responsible for any problems that may arise from using your password. Your app informs the user about offers in their area that the user can take advantage of via e-mail. Your app does not share user information with third parties, and the phone number may be shared with the shop that handles external food orders, in order to provide a quick and correct delivery service. In order for the user to take advantage of application services that require membership in your application, the user must enter the user name and password. This process is called "login" to your app

When you use the site, you guarantee that any personal information provided by you is correct, accurate, valid and complete in all respects and that you will immediately notify us of any changes to your personal information by updating your membership information on the site or by contacting us. You agree not to impersonate any person or other party or use a false name or a name that is not authorized to be used.
You are not allowed to register multiple memberships for use by the same person. A violation of this clause may result in the termination of your membership.
Members' passwords must be kept strictly confidential at all times and should not be shared or disclosed to anyone else. You are responsible for all activities and requests that occur or are submitted through your membership. If you become aware or suspect that someone knows your password, then you should contact us immediately.
You may not use the site for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, including without limitation:
Distribution of any illegal, defamatory, offensive, threatening, harmful, pornographic or offensive material

Sending materials that violate the law, religions, beliefs, doctrines or morals, and result in civil liability or otherwise that violates any laws, regulations, regulations or practices
Interfering with or enjoying anyone's site
Causing damage to the site, obstructing or minimizing the operation of this site or attempting to gain unauthorized access to this site or to the networks connected to it, through piracy, deception or other similar means
